message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper focuses on the development of advanced applications of neural machine translation systems, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of deep learning models, which is a popular topic in machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper mentions image and video captioning, sentence classification, and visual question answering, which are all related to computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses long-term adaptation of the translation system via continuous learning, which is related to neural networks (cs.NE).
